content:
You can attach a few files for test decryption by packing them into an archive with zip, rar, tar, 7zip, 7z, tar.gz extensions of no more than 10 megabytes using the attach button directly in the chat.

If your archive weighs more than 10 megabytes, please use our file sharing service.
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion
http://lockbitfsvf75glg226he5inkfgtuoakt4vgfhd7nfgghx5kwz5zo3ad.onion
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion
For security reasons we do not click on other links you send in chat.
Please wait for a reply, sometimes it takes several hours due to possible time zone differences.
OK

Thanks. thank god i don have to deal with many eyes because the ID was leaked. 
Yes, i believe you guys that we will receive decryptor after they payment.  That's why im asking people to buy as many btc as possible.  We're in China so everything is so difficult under heavy regulation.  Now i'm personally asking an north american friend to pay you first if possible.  Currently just waiting for his reply.
is it possible to delete or hide the old chatroom links temporarily?
Yes
We can delete only after payment. Don't worry, as soon as you pay we will delete everything.
Yes, thanks for clarifying everything. we will now focus working on the BTC.
Ok we are waiting for payment from you
We waiting updates from you today

Hi there, it is confirmed that we WILL make the payment. according to my boss I will fly to another city to meet a friend and currency exchanger.  It was to avoid regulation.


the chat page will be opened most of the time during the day so I should reply you quickly now.
I'll head out when they finish discussing . should be in 2 days but i can't be 100% sure. things are progressing slow and steady .
We gave you a discount and want to close this issue quickly.
Yes it was thankful that we had this discount. please understand now we're fully working on making this happen.
Just a little bit more time.
We waiting updates from you today!
Hi there. The 3 branch offices are negotiating how much ransom each node is going to pay. We are waiting for their result.
I recommend you pay as soon as possible, it is in your best interest.We met you halfway and gave you a discount. We can reconsider the amount.
How long do we have to wait?

Ok, I just heard the message from my directors.   It shall be in 1 or 2 days.   They are having the final price negoation ( between the 3 branch offices) tomorrow. once they have made it, i will start heading out to meet my currency exchanger in another city.  So 1 maybe max 2 days. its like a 1000km travel and will take 4 hrs by train or flight.
the funny thing is, we have already told them you need to pay 0.25 btc to recover 1 file or 1 TB file, no difference. but the 3 branches are still hesitating and argueing.
We have given you a lot of time. We think you are playing with us, but I do not advise you to do this. We give you the last 2 days to pay or we will delete everything.
This BTC address to pay - bc1q2wn37aax40gm0qc34j7qff5acq8k8wgwscv85c

Please do not worry. We are not playing with you and this is serious. At least, I personally want to finish this as soon as possible. But I am not in charge of these branches.   I will give you update today soon.
bc1q2wn37aax40gm0qc34j7qff5acq8k8wgwscv85c, copy
i'm new to btc payments. is this address one-time only?
We expect payment from you today. You can deal with your offices as much as you want, it's not our problem. This wallet is correct. It is reusable
I hope you understand the seriousness of the problem. We have been waiting for you for too long. We will delete your decryptor and you will never recover your files again.
We expect payment from you today.
I do but these guys do not. They have just finished discussion there and I have very bad news for you and maybe for both of us.  They decided not to pay anything and rebuild their data.
Anyway , i thought this could be a successful experience but it turned out to be not.

oops i can't even send my chat now
you can do anything you want now.

Okay. We also downloaded some documents from your computers, now we will publish them in the public domain. And we will start writing to your clients that your data was stolen and they will be published.
honestly i'd say just del the decrypter
Yes, we will delete and publish your data.
and maybe hack them again.
Will you list/publihs Yukita company on your blog soon?
